item.title: Multilayer Perceptron
item.description: Introduction to Deep Learning Assignment 1: Multilayer Perceptron MNIST Dataset NOTE: This Tutorial was done on google colab so it includes some google cloud helper functions. In this assignment we are going to build a very basic deep learning model called as multilayer perceptron. Also we are going to expriment on it a little bit as suggested on the course website. Multilayer Perceptron Multilayer perceptron is a type of feed forward network, it has minimum 3 layers(although we don’t count input and output as layers) input layer, hidden layer and output layer.
